714918f-a.title: Manhattan: 98th Street (East) - Lexington Avenue
714918f-a.text:
East 98th Street, north side, west from and including Lexington, to and including Park Aves. Also shown is Lexington Ave., at and adjoining the N.W. corner of East 98th Street. Buildings shown, form a part of the Interborough Rapit Transit.Shops.
March 11, 1931.
P . L. Sperr.

721096f-a.title: Manhattan: Lexington Avenue - 98th Street (East)
721096f-a.text:
Lexington Avenue, north from E. 98th Street, showing on the west side of same the shops and barns of the lInterborough Rapid
Transit Co.
September 14, 1938.
P.L. Sperr

721097f-b.title: Manhattan: Lexington Avenue - 98th Street
721097f-b.text:
Interborough Rapid Transit shops and yards, LeEington Avenue, west side, from 98th to 99th Streets.
February 27, 1928.
P.L. Sperr,Photographer.
